## About 

I am currently working as a doctoral researcher in the Probabilistic Machine Learning ([PML](https://research.cs.aalto.fi/pml/)) group at Aalto University in Finland, supervised by [Aki Vehtari](https://avehtari.github.io/) and [Antti Oulasvirta](http://users.comnet.aalto.fi/oulasvir/).
